name: VocaDB - Sakura Miku 1.54b
description: Whipped this up for personal use :) Background by みゆ
additional_info:
1.54
   - fixed css which having .btn-primary:focus was blue after having it activated with hover+focus and mousing off of it.
   a - minor fix
   b - updated for lyrics page stylizing

1.53
   - updated in correspondence to the .menu class changes.

1.52
   - everything back to normal

1.51 - Glowing Pink Buttons!
   a - song info button for pv player has glow, but not like the submit/edit pages.
   b - using higher Q of the bg
   c - fixed navbar colors being red after visiting them
   d - rating buttons on the front page no longer black
   e - fixed .rightFrame colors
   f - minor style change adjustment
       - .pvViewerContent a now exists. 

1.5 - Code cleanup
    - updated for class changes

1.13 - Pink song info button!

1.12 - Made menu links slightly darker

1.1 - Rounded edges and border fixing for the Featured Widget

1.0 - Initial Release

Make sure to upload or get your background to/from a site that allows hotlinking
